name: amisdex-contracts
author: AmisDex <gitter.im/ERC20-AMIS/Lobby>(https://github.com/amisolution)
description: amisdex smart contracts and their tests

scripts.test: truffle test && shx mkdir -p .nyc_output && shx mv coverage.data .nyc_output/ && shx cp ../ubitok-jslib/reference-exchange.js . && ./node_modules/.bin/nyc report --report-dir report --reporter=html
scripts.start: pnpm install dotenv; pnpm install truffle-hdwallet-provider; pnpm install truffle-privatekey-provider; pnpm install -g truffle@3.2.1; node_modules/.bin/truffle serve --force
